levels.description: Attacks an ally within range (prioritizes allies directly in front of this unit) <@ba.vup>15</> times for <@ba.vup>{damage}</> damage, and then increases ATK by <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and ASPD by <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> of self and that unit for the remaining duration of this skill
